pull.title: build: remove native_biplist dependency
pull.body:
`ds_store` [now takes advantage](https://github.com/al45tair/ds_store/commit/36fb60794029b8556ee13693e7020a7e13d0c04b) of Pythons ability to decode binary [plists](https://docs.python.org/3/library/plistlib.html) (since 3.4), so we can drop its biplist dependency.

The call to `biplist.Data()` in `custom_dsstore.py` doesn't seem to do anything, and from what I can tell can just be removed. i.e:
```diff
diff --git a/contrib/macdeploy/custom_dsstore.py b/contrib/macdeploy/custom_dsstore.py
index dc1c1882d..e475bc6c3 100755
--- a/contrib/macdeploy/custom_dsstore.py
+++ b/contrib/macdeploy/custom_dsstore.py
@@ -47,6 +47,7 @@ alias.volume.disk_image_alias.target.filename = package_name_ns + '.temp.dmg'
 alias.volume.disk_image_alias.target.carbon_path = 'Macintosh HD:Users:\x00bitcoinuser:\x00Documents:\x00bitcoin:\x00bitcoin:\x00' + package_name_ns + '.temp.dmg'
 alias.volume.disk_image_alias.target.posix_path = 'Users/bitcoinuser/Documents/bitcoin/bitcoin/' + package_name_ns + '.temp.dmg'
 alias.target.carbon_path = package_name_ns + ':.background:\x00background.tiff'
+assert(biplist.Data(alias.to_bytes()) == alias.to_bytes())
 icvp['backgroundImageAlias'] = biplist.Data(alias.to_bytes())
 ds['.']['icvp'] = icvp
```

issue.title: macOS deploy: use the new plistlib API
issue.body:
See https://docs.python.org/3/library/plistlib.html.
The old API was deprecated in 3.4 and removed in 3.9.

~~AFAIK the macdeployplus scripts is only used when calling `make deploy` locally (on macOS). The linux cross compile build (like gitian) are not affected by this PR.~~

verification.payload:
tree f2bf72563eda31360d121137f00a092c970d776c
parent fa8dd34e918cd80db215df8937aaf6bb1552fcd9
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1604739501 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1605052862 +0800

depends: native_ds_store 1.3.0

native_ds_store now takes advantage of Pythons ability to decode binary
plists (since 3.4), so we can drop its biplist dependency.

The call to biplist.Data() in custom_dsstore doesn't seem to do anything,
and from what I can tell can just be removed.

events.message:
depends: native_ds_store 1.3.0

native_ds_store now takes advantage of Pythons ability to decode binary
plists (since 3.4), so we can drop its biplist dependency.

The call to biplist.Data() in custom_dsstore doesn't seem to do anything,
and from what I can tell can just be removed.

issue.title: build: mac deployment unification
issue.body:
This consolidates our macOS build code so that `.DS_Store` generation is the same when running `make deploy` for macOS when building on Linux and macOS, rather than maintaining two version of code that essentially do the same thing (just slightly differently).

It also removes unused code and any AppleScript usage, automates finding translation files and generally simplifies `macdeployqtplus`. It also gets rid of the annoying "popping up" behaviour during DMG generation, names the created image `Bitcoin-Core.dmg` rather than `Bitcoin-Qt.dmg`.

events.body:
ACK 7087440894a9daa7de806c5aa42d83ad60759c65
Although this is Mac-black-magic to me, it's always good to drop an unnecessary dependency.

issue.title: [Depends] Update macOS cross-compiling toolchain
issue.body:
This backports the following upstream PRs to update the macOS cross-compiling tools:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17550
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16392
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18589
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19240
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19407
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17919
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19530
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17057
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20333
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18051
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19124
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20298
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20447

The tools being updated are

### Clang
Upgraded from `3.7.1` to `8.0.0`

### cctools

* cctools `877.8` -> `949.0.1`
* LD64 `253.9` -> `530`
* TAPI `1000.10.8`

### DSStore
Upgraded from `1.1.2` to `1.3.0` (this removes the biplist dependency)

This also effectively bumps our minimum supported macOS version to 10.12 (Sierra).

comments.body: Any reason why we should use a specific commit rather than `v1.3.0`?

Good call. When I went looking in the repo, I assumed that [1.2.0](https://github.com/al45tair/ds_store/commit/f8a5f7f13eb345b0f9f7d2f0a1058b86aacd0774) was the latest release. I'd missed https://github.com/al45tair/ds_store/commit/aa82c93a272c27a528c903f2525c24b69ac54cff as it's not actually in the master branch.
